Terim: "Ha sido lamentable"
06 Nov 2019, 23:22 by Sport.es

El DT turco lamentó la senda goleada que le propinó el cuadro merengue

Fatih Terim, técnico del Galatasaray, se señaló como el "responsable" de la mala imagen de su equipo en el Santiago Bernabéu, goleado 6-0 por el Real Madrid, en un partido que calificó de "lamentable",
"No esperábamos este resultado tan abultado pero si miramos el juego ha sido lamentable. Sentimos mucho haber dado esta imagen. Empezamos perdiendo 3-0 y era imposible levantarlo", aseguró en rueda de prensa.
"No es fácil jugar contra el Real Madrid pero mi idea era encontrar un equipo luchador y no lo hemos sido esta noche. Estamos tristes por nuestra afición. Puedes perder pero de esta manera duele más", añadió.
Terim dejó elogios al Real Madrid pero fue crítico con su equipo. "El Real Madrid ha sido fabuloso, hay que reconocerlo y aceptarlo pero ha recibido a un Galatasaray que no ha podido resistir. Nos hemos desconectado muy pronto del partido y ellos, relajados, han encontrado su juego y mejorado mucho respecto al partido de ida".

Terim: "It has been unfortunate"
06 Nov 2019, 23:22 by Sport.es

The Turkish coach regretted the scoring path that the merengue team gave him

Fatih Terim, Galatasaray coach, said he was "responsible" for the bad image of his team at the Santiago Bernabéu, thrashed 6-0 by Real Madrid, in a game that he described as "unfortunate",
"We did not expect this result so bulky but if we look at the game it has been unfortunate. We are very sorry to have given this image. We started losing 3-0 and it was impossible to lift it," he said at a press conference.
"It is not easy to play against Real Madrid but my idea was to find a fighting team and we have not been tonight. We are sad for our fans. You can lose but this way it hurts more," he added.
Terim praised Real Madrid but was critical of his team. "Real Madrid has been fabulous, you have to recognize and accept it but you have received a Galatasaray that has not been able to resist. We have disconnected very soon from the game and they, relaxed, have found their game and improved a lot regarding the first leg" .
